text: Remember to Dismember is Western Addiction's EP to support the then-upcoming album Cognicide on Fat Wreck Chords. It features two tracks, "From the Ramparts" and "Not a Surrender", that were not on Cognicide. Remember to Dismember was recorded and mixed by Randy Burk. ==Track listing== #"Charged Words" #"From the Ramparts" #"Incendiary Minds" #"Not a Surrender" Category:2003 EPs Category:Fat Wreck Chords EPs Category:Western Addiction albums
title: Remember to Dismember
